tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_beneficiary_agency CASCADE; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_beneficiary_agency AS SELECT aav.amp_activity_id, v.org_name, COALESCE(v.org_id, -999999999) AS org_id, percentage, COALESCE(v.cnt_nulls, 0) AS cnt_nulls FROM amp_activity_version aav LEFT JOIN ( SELECT f.activity AS amp_activity_id, org.org_name, org.org_id, SUM(f.percentage) AS percentage, COUNT(*) - COUNT(f.percentage) AS cnt_nulls FROM amp_org_role f JOIN ni_all_orgs_dimension org ON org.org_id = f.organisation JOIN amp_role r ON (f.role = r.amp_role_id) AND (r.role_code = 'BA') GROUP BY f.activity, org.org_id, org.org_name ) v ON aav.amp_activity_id = v.amp_activity_id;
